required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate Safety and Efficacy of Endovascualr Denervation in Treatment of Cancer Pain
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Multicenter, Self-Control Clinical Trial to Evaluate Safety and Efficacy of Endovascular Denervation in Treatment of Cancer Pain

lead_sponsor.agency: Shanghai Golden Leaf MedTec Co. Ltd

clinical_study.source: Shanghai Golden Leaf MedTec Co. Ltd

brief_summary.textblock: A prospective, multicenter, self-control clinical trial aim to enroll 110 patients suffered from upper abdominal (liver, pancreas, stomach, etc.) cancers . Patients who have taken at least one opioid drug for pain for two weeks and still have a VAS pain scale greater than 6 will receive endovascular denervation (EDN). They will be followed up for 3 months. The VAS scales, quantity of analgesics as represented by morphine equivalent and quality of life scores will be compared before and after EDN. Safety parameters such as arterial deformation, embolism, infection, liver and kidney functions will also be monitored.

primary_outcome.measure: Visual Analog Scale Changes over the time
primary_outcome.description: Pain scale is evaluated as Woodforde Visual Analig Scale (VAS) method. The scale is from 0 to 10, with 0 being no pain, and 10 being unbearable pain.

secondary_outcome.measure: Morphine Equivalent Changes over the time
secondary_outcome.description: All analgesics used will be calculated to Morphine Equivalent using published conversion factors.

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of Life Score Changes over the time
secondary_outcome.description: Qulaity of Life Scores are obtained using Functional Assessment of Cancer Theray-Generic Scale (FACT-G) (v 4.0) sale. The score is from 0 to 108, with 0 being no quality of life, and 108 being highest quality of life.

intervention.description: A radiofrequency ablation catheter will be placed in abdominal aorta. At least 6 sites will be ablated with settings of temerature at 60 degree centigrade and time at 120 seconds.

overall_official.affiliation: Shanghai JiaoTong University Affiliated RuiJin Hospital
Beijing University Affiliated the First Hospital
